languages.text: "Возможно, именно так и звучит мое признание... но поверь мне в одном — то, что движет мной, куда важнее моего былого молчания".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, именно так и звучит мое признание... но поверь мне в одном — то, что движет мной, куда важнее моего былого молчания".

languages.text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, именно так и звучит мое признание... но поверь мне в одном — то, что движет мной, куда важнее моего былого молчания".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."
"Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."
"Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."
"Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

languages.text: 「我の話はそのようにとられるだろう…しかし、ひとつ信じてもらいたい。今の我を駆り立てるものは、これまでの沈黙よりもはるかに重要なものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: 「我の話はそのようにとられるだろう…しかし、ひとつ信じてもらいたい。今の我を駆り立てるものは、これまでの沈黙よりもはるかに重要なものなのだ」

languages.text: “或许我的话听起来确实很可疑……但请你相信，我此时此刻的目的，比我之前的沉默要重要得多。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: “或许我的话听起来确实很可以……但请你相信，我此时此刻的目的，比我之前的沉默要重要得多。”

languages.text: «Tal vez mi confesión suene así... pero no dudes de esto: lo que me impulsa ahora es mucho más importante que mi silencio anterior».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez mi confesión suene así... pero no dudes de esto: lo que me impulsa ahora es mucho más importante que mi silencio anterior».

languages.text: "Mein Eingeständnis mag so klingen ... aber bitte glaubt eines – was mich nun antreibt, ist viel wichtiger als mein früheres Schweigen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Eingeständnis mag so klingen ... aber bitte glaubt eines – was mich nun antreibt, ist viel wichtiger als mein früheres Schweigen."

languages.text: « Je peux comprendre que vous perceviez mes aveux ainsi, mais je vous prie de croire une chose : ce qui me motive aujourd'hui est beaucoup important que ce qui me faisait taire précédemment. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux comprendre que vous perceviez mes aveux ainsi, mais je vous prie de croire une chose : ce qui me motive aujourd'hui est beaucoup important que ce qui me faisait taire précédemment. »

languages.text: "Belki itirafım kulağa gerçekten öyle geliyordur. Lütfen tek bir konuda bana güven: Beni şu an bu yolda ilerlemeye iten şey, öncesindeki sessizliğime sebep olan şeyden daha önemli."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps my admission does sound like that... but please believe one thing — what propels me now is much more important than my earlier silence."

traits.locale_text: "Belki itirafım kulağa gerçekten öyle geliyordur. Lütfen tek bir konuda bana güven: Beni şu an bu yolda ilerlemeye iten şey, öncesindeki sessizliğime sebep olan şeyden daha önemli."
